skills.name: DEMON MIRROR
desc: • Deals 4 hits of magic damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to Steal One Beneficial Effect or Smite targets for 2 turns per hit.
• Deal Additional True Damage to targets for each Golden Buff currently on them.

skills.name: SIN KEEPER
desc: • Deals 4 hits of magic damage to all enemies.
• Heal all allies based on your MAX HP.
• Grants Critical Strike Chance to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: LIGHT OF MERCY
desc: • Increase the duration of beneficial effects by 1 turn at the start of battle.
• Grant Immunity to all allies if Regen HP is present at the start of your turn..
